apps.name: Reel Roulette
apps.tagline: Movie search, watchlists, and a movie wheel picker.
apps.description: Find movies fast, build watchlists, and use a roulette wheel to pick something to watch.

apps.name: Shady Encoding
apps.tagline: Utility to encode/decode text with custom keys.
apps.description: Encode/decode text with your own key. Quick, simple, offline.
